meanings.definition: A person who interferes or meddles in the affairs of others.
meanings.sent1: My little sister is such a buttinskies, always peeking into my room without permission.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood gossip is known as the local buttinskies.
meanings.sent3: During the game of hide and seek, my dog became a buttinskies by revealing my hiding spot with his barking.
meanings.sent4: The curious squirrel acted like a buttinskies, watching the picnic from a nearby tree.
meanings.sent5: In the school play, the character of the nosy neighbor was portrayed as a buttinskies, constantly eavesdropping on others.

meanings.definition: To interfere or meddle in the affairs of others.
meanings.sent1: Please don't buttinskies in my personal matters; I can handle them on my own.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist buttinskies in her friend's relationship, offering unsolicited advice.
meanings.sent3: The cat buttinskies with the yarn, causing a tangled mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The mischievous elf buttinskies with the toy factory's production, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The robot butler was programmed not to buttinskies in the family's conversations, respecting their privacy.
